detail_desc: Cardigan in soft, rib-knit cotton with a V-neck, long sleeves and wrapover front with a tie belt at the waist.
Imitation leather sandals with two straps with adjustable hook and loop fasteners at the front, and a strap at the back with a loop. Ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) insoles and soles.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy jersey with a paper bag waist, detachable tie belt and side pockets. Fly with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener, and straight wide legs.
Fitted, knee-length skirt woven in a cotton blend with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and a sewn-in wrapover at the front with decorative buttons at the top. Unlined.
Fitted, knee-length skirt woven in a cotton blend with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and a sewn-in wrapover at the front with decorative buttons at the top. Unlined.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with a scalloped edge around the brim and ties under the chin. Lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Velour soft toy wearing a removable all-in-one suit. Polyester filling. Size approx. 25 cm.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
